data.title: The Drowsy Chaperone
data.meta_description: The Drowsy Chaperone - Free download as Powerpoint Presentation (.ppt / .pptx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or view presentation slides online. The document provides an overview of the musical "The Drowsy Chaperone". It discusses that the show has a small, flexible cast of 13 roles featuring a variety of singers and dancers. It notes some of the production requirements like costumes from the 1920s, potential challenges with building a plane for the set, and needing a large stage for numbers. It also covers musical accompaniment, potential for hiring musicians, and using the local high school theater for performances. Lastly, it states the show revolves around a man listening to the record of a 1920s musical, bringing the characters to life in his apartment through the story.
